definitions.definition: Any of various languages spoken by the Slavic peoples, such as Proto-Slavic , Common Slavic , Old Church Slavic , or the modern Slavic languages .
examples: It is a commonly known fact that formal marks of perfective aspect in Slavic are prefixes.

main_definition: Any of various languages spoken by the Slavic peoples, such as Proto-Slavic , Common Slavic , Old Church Slavic , or the modern Slavic languages .
